text: The Story of Louis Pasteur is a 1936 American biographical drama movie directed by William Dieterle and starring Paul Muni, Josephine Hutchinson, Anita Louise, Donald Woods, Fritz Leiber, Henry O'Neill, Porter Hall. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and was nominated for 4 Oscars and won 3 Academy Awards in 1937. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1936 drama movies Category:1930s biographical movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:Movies directed by William Dieterle
title: The Story of Louis Pasteur
